content.body:
> <@smaug:mozilla.org> but https://w3c.github.io/FileAPI/#dfn-type at least says that it should be always lower case

I think that is kind of under debate, in https://github.com/w3c/FileAPI/issues/43 . But having the tests not match the spec is indeed not great.
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @smaug:mozilla.org
but https://w3c.github.io/FileAPI/#dfn-type at least says that it should be always lower case
I think that is kind of under debate, in https://github.com/w3c/FileAPI/issues/43 . But having the tests not match the spec is indeed not great.

content.body: hober: nice to see https://github.com/WebKit/standards-positions ! What should we do with Warnocked requests for position emails to webkit-dev? Open an issue or assume lack of interest?
